entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
